ps2.7:1.2: iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa “aññāsikoṇḍañño” tveva nāmaṃ ahosi.
ps2.7:2.1: “Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan”ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.7:4.6: Ime pañca dhammā pañca atthā dukkhavatthukā saccavatthukā saccārammaṇā saccagocarā saccasaṅgahitā saccapariyāpannā sacce samudāgatā sacce ṭhitā sacce patiṭṭhitā.
ps2.7:5.23: Taṃ kho pana dhammacakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.1: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.2: Akampiyaṭṭhena balaṃ dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.3: Niyyānikaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgo dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.4: Hetuṭṭhena maggo dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.5: Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānā dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.6: Padahanaṭṭhena sammappadhānā dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.7: Ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhipādā dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.8: Tathaṭṭhena saccā dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.9: Avikkhepaṭṭhena samatho dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.10: Anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.11: Ekarasaṭṭhena samathavipassanā dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.12: Anativattanaṭṭhena yuganaddhaṃ dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.13: Saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhi dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.14: Avikkhepaṭṭhena cittavisuddhi dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.15: Dassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhivisuddhi dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.16: Muttaṭṭhena vimokkho dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.17: Paṭivedhaṭṭhena vijjā dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.18: Pariccāgaṭṭhena vimutti dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.19: Samucchedaṭṭhena khaye ñāṇaṃ dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.20: Paṭippassaddhaṭṭhena anuppāde ñāṇaṃ dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.21: Chando mūlaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.22: Manasikāro samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.23: Phasso samodhānaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.24: Vedanā samosaraṇaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.25: Samādhi pamukhaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.26: Sati ādhipateyyaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.27: Paññā taduttaraṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.28: Vimutti sāraṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:7.29: Amatogadhaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:8.2: pariññātanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:9.11: Ime pañca dhammā pañca atthā dukkhavatthukā saccavatthukā saccārammaṇā saccagocarā saccasaṅgahitā saccapariyāpannā sacce samudāgatā sacce ṭhitā sacce patiṭṭhitā.
ps2.7:10.8: amatogadhaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:11.1: “Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccan”ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:13.3: Ime pañca dhammā pañca atthā samudayavatthukā saccavatthukā …pe…
ps2.7:13.5: maggavatthukā saccavatthukā saccārammaṇā saccagocarā saccasaṅgahitā saccapariyāpannā sacce samudāgatā sacce ṭhitā sacce patiṭṭhitā.
ps2.7:14.8: amatogadhaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:15.1: “‘Ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:15.3: Sā kho panāyaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā bhāvetabbāti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.7:15.4: bhāvitāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:16.3: ayaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:16.5: Sā kho panāyaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanā bhāvetabbāti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.7:16.6: bhāvitāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:17.1: “Ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā”ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:17.3: sā kho panāyaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā bhāvetabbāti …pe…
ps2.7:17.4: bhāvitāti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:19.3: Ime pañca dhammā pañca atthā kāyavatthukā satipaṭṭhānavatthukā …pe…
ps2.7:19.6: dhammavatthukā satipaṭṭhānavatthukā satipaṭṭhānārammaṇā satipaṭṭhānagocarā satipaṭṭhānasaṅgahitā satipaṭṭhānapariyāpannā satipaṭṭhāne samudāgatā satipaṭṭhāne ṭhitā satipaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhitā.
ps2.7:20.8: amatogadhaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṭṭhena dhammo taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:21.1: “‘Ayaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo’ti me, bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:21.3: ‘So kho panāyaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabbo’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.7:21.4: bhāvitoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:22.3: ayaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:22.5: So kho panāyaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.7:22.6: bhāvitoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:23.1: “Ayaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo”ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:23.3: so kho panāyaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti …pe…
ps2.7:23.4: bhāvitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.7:25.6: Ime pañca dhammā pañca atthā chandavatthukā iddhipādavatthukā iddhipādārammaṇā iddhipādagocarā iddhipādasaṅgahitā iddhipādapariyāpannā iddhipāde samudāgatā iddhipāde ṭhitā iddhipāde patiṭṭhitā.
ps2.7:26.17: Taṃ kho pana dhammacakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti—dhammacakkaṃ.
ps2.7:28.1: Ayaṃ vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:28.3: so kho panāyaṃ vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti …pe…
ps2.7:28.4: bhāvitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…
ps2.7:30.3: Ime pañca dhammā pañca atthā vīriyavatthukā iddhipādavatthukā …pe…
ps2.7:30.5: vīmaṃsāvatthukā iddhipādavatthukā iddhipādārammaṇā iddhipādagocarā iddhipādasaṅgahitā iddhipādapariyāpannā iddhipāde samudāgatā iddhipāde ṭhitā iddhipāde patiṭṭhitā.
